Will be translated to: LegendreQ($1, $0, $2)
Constraints: -1 < x < 1, \mu, \nu \in \Reals
Relevant links to definitions:
DLMF:  http://dlmf.nist.gov/14.3#E2
Maple: https://www.maplesoft.com/support/help/maple/view.aspx?path=LegendreQ
